text:
<@U07AH2ENYTF> Personalization token only works when you are showing that data on browser to a logged in user. It’s not actually public. To make the image public you would have to upload it to File Manager and inject the URL to the property.

Then you can call the URL directly. Please confirm this from HubSpot Support as well. Just in case they have some other solution newly implemented but as far I know you can’t
I had to add a timeout and additional checks which doesn't feel right...is there a global event I can listen for in this case?
